summary: Shift Scheduling feature validation completed successfully. Navigated to Time > Attendance > Shift Scheduler. Verified week/month views with date navigation. Confirmed work center dropdown functionality with multiple centers (All, helo, DIFC Office, Business Bay Branch). Schedule Planner dialog tested - prompts for work center selection before proceeding. Split shifts feature available (Learn about split shifts button with NEW badge). Copy Schedule and Publish shifts buttons disabled when All work centers selected, requiring specific work center selection. Employee grid displays work center, name, hours, and shift count. Pagination functional (25/50/100/150 per page). Attendance report accessed showing employee records with Schedule, Check In/Out, Hours Worked, and action menus for edit/delete. Primary entity identified as 'Shift'. All CRUD operations available but not fully tested to avoid creating test data. Import/export functionality confirmed missing from shift scheduler (Download only in Attendance Report). 9 validation tasks completed: 7 PASSED, 2 PARTIAL. 6 known limitations documented with 2 CONFIRMED during validation.
